test-set.name: sf-distinct-values
test-set.description: Tests the xsl:stream instruction with distinct-values()

test-case.name: sf-distinct-values-001
test-case.description: Test of xsl:stream instruction with distinct-values(), applied to an attribute

test-case.name: sf-distinct-values-002
test-case.description: Test of xsl:stream instruction with distinct-values(), empty input

test-case.name: sf-distinct-values-003
test-case.description: Test of xsl:stream instruction with distinct-values(), numeric values

test-case.name: sf-distinct-values-004
test-case.description: Test of xsl:stream instruction with distinct-values(), handling of NaN

test-case.name: sf-distinct-values-005
test-case.description: Test of xsl:stream instruction with distinct-values(), applied to an element

test-case.name: sf-distinct-values-006
test-case.description: Test of xsl:stream instruction with distinct-values(), with collation specified

test-case.name: sf-distinct-values-007
test-case.description: Test of xsl:stream instruction with distinct-values(), with unknown collation specified

test-case.name: sf-distinct-values-008
test-case.description: Test of xsl:stream instruction with distinct-values(), with unknown collation specified, error is caught

test-case.name: sf-distinct-values-009
test-case.description: Test of xsl:stream instruction with distinct-values(), with collation from consuming argument

test-case.name: sf-distinct-values-010
test-case.description: Test of xsl:stream instruction with distinct-values(), with unknown collation from consuming argument

test-case.name: sf-distinct-values-011
test-case.description: Test of xsl:stream instruction with distinct-values(), with unknown collation from consuming argument, error is caught
